name.description: Name of the channel. This is a one-line human-readable description of the channel

description.description: Description of the channel. This is a one-line human-readable description of the channel

support.description: Support  Level provided by the vendor

requires.description: Channels that are required by this channel.

resolveWithLocalCache.description: Whether the local cache from Maven must be checked to resolve the latest versions from this channel.

repositories.description: Maven repositories that contains all artifacts from this channel.

url.description: Base URL of the Maven repository.

streams.description: Streams of components that are provided by this channel

groupId.description: GroupId of the stream. It must be either a valid groupId (corresponding to a G of a Maven GAV) or the * character to represent any groupId

artifactId.description: ArtifactId of the stream. It must be either a valid artifactId (corresponding to a A of a Maven GAV) or the * character to represent any artifactId

version.description: Version of the stream. This must be either a single version or a list of comma-separated versions. Only one of version, versionPattern or versionRule must be set.

versionPattern.description: VersionPattern of the stream. This is a regular expression that matches any version from this stream. Only one of version, versionPattern or versionRule must be set.

versionRule.description: VersionRule of the stream. This requires a base version to determine which is the latest version that applies to the rule.This is a regular expression that matches any version from this stream. Only one of version, versionPattern or versionRule must be set.

stream.description: Specifies the stream of the base version to use to determine the latest version

qualifiers.description: qualifiers to determine the latest version according to this rule. At least one of the qualifier must be matched
